about_the_game:
HOUSE 2 is the sequel to the hit indie horror game, House.

Featuring:

- Hand drawn storybook art style
- Explore environments that changes and react to your actions in real-time
- Multiple endings to discover
- Experiment with the different items to try and survive
- Challenging, non-linear gameplay
- Find a way to free yourself from a horrific & deadly time loop

content_descriptors.notes: House 2 frequently depicts graphic scenes of cartoon violence and gore during player deaths. Be aware that themes of suicide are also present.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8.1, Windows 10, or Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA since 2006 (GeForce 8), AMD since 2006 (Radeon HD 2000), Intel since 2012 (HD 4000 / IvyBridge)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Must support the ASIO audio device interface for multi-channel recording / playback, or support WDM (Windows Driver Model) audio.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8.1, Windows 10, or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Corei5-6600K/ AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 3GB/ AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Must support the ASIO audio device interface for multi-channel recording / playback, or support WDM (Windows Driver Model) audio.
